mods.name: Timescale
mods.description: /timescale 0.5 to halve the speed of time
mods.author: ZXMushroom63

mods.name: Easy block registerer
mods.description: Add your custom blocks to the game easily
mods.author: Oeil-de-Lynx

mods.name: Advanced Block Of Steve
mods.description: An advanced version of the Block of Steve mod. Requires AsyncSink.
mods.author: ZXMushroom63

mods.name: AsyncSink
mods.description: Library for patching and hooking into asynchronous filesystem requests for EaglercraftX.
mods.author: By ZXMushroom63

mods.name: Simple Block Of Steve
mods.description: An simple version of the Block of Steve mod. Requires AsyncSink.
mods.author: ZXMushroom63

mods.name: DiamondCraftingRecipeMod
mods.description: Adds a crafting recipe to create diamond blocks from dirt.

mods.name: Dupe Hunting
mods.description: ⚠️Only works over WS, not local. May induce bans.⚠️
mods.author: by ZXMushroom63

mods.name: SimpleHats
mods.description: Use /hat to wear whatever you are holding
mods.author: Made with ❤️ by ZXMushroom63

mods.name: LibCustomItems
mods.description: Library to make adding basic custom items easier.
mods.author: By ZXMushroom63

mods.name: MobLife viewer
mods.description: Mod to see the mobs life in real time.
mods.author: By Oeildelynx

mods.name: Unlucky Blocks
mods.description: These purple cubes ruined my life. Requires AsyncSink.
mods.author: By ZXMushroom63

mods.name: Simple VClip Exploit
mods.description: Use .vclip <offset> to vertically phase through blocks.
mods.author: By ZXMushroom63

mods.name: Waypoints Mod
mods.description: Use /setwp <name> to make a waypoint, and /wp <name> to go to it. /remwp <name> to delete a waypoint. /listwp to list all waypoints.
mods.author: By blizz828, Block_2222 & ZXMushroom63
